# Summary

This panel discussion featured researchers from the Center for the Advancement of Military and Emergency Services Research (AMES) at Kennesaw State University. The panel discussed the nexus of research and practice in suicide prevention.

# Citation

Hess, C., Horan, K., Moore, B.A. (May 2023). “Using research to enhance the practice of suicide prevention.” Hodges, T.J., Panel Moderator. Let’s Connect Summit Conference. Kennesaw, Georgia, Public.
